ygData.subject: The Ultimate Battle

(I know I know. I'm a fool.)

Brix/Fliq

Fliq laughed inside at Ramulus.

Oh, you wanna move, huh? Well how much is it worh to ya? I'm just 
kiddin'. Hold on.

Fliq started talking to Brix.

"Yeah, Ramulus is fine. But he wants to get out now."

"Yeah, all right. Tell him to lose consiousness. I'm removing his 
spark. Hold on Fliq."

Inside Fliq's body: Go to stasis lock. He's moving your spark.

Brix pulled open Fliq's chest plate. Fliq gaped.

"Wow....my spark..."

Brix began to remoe one of the sparks. Fliq wasn't shrieking in pain, 
so he assumed it was Ramulus'. He started the transfer.
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

Vulois stepped infront of Child as teh Vok blast ht him square in teh 
chest, casusing him to wince. He was Windrazor and the Peace Angels 
try to fight this monster, but Vulois yelled.

"No! I appreciate the help, but this is one battle only Child and I 
must face. Vok vs. Matrix."

Vulois began channeling energy inside his hands. He looked at the 
Beast, almost as if Vulois' eyes were on fire.

"I give you one chance.....leave now."
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

Starscream yelled at Reptillica.

"Come one! You're really slow." Starscream opened his cockpit, "Get 
in. We'll be faster."
